Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-187.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, S. Rept. 94-165.

official_title: A bill to provide an authorization for an ex gratia payment to the people of Bikini Atoll, in the Marshall Islands of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-187) Authorizes the appropriation of $3,000,000, ex gratia, in recognition of the hardship suffered by the people of Bikini due to displacement from their atoll since 1946. Directs such sum to be paid to a trustee selected by the Kili/Bikini Council subject only to disapproval by the High Commissioner of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands to be held in trust pursuant to the provisions of a trust agreement or amendment thereto agreed to by the Council for the use and benefit of, and distribution to, persons who possess rights in Bikini Atoll.

titles.title: A bill to provide an authorization for an ex gratia payment to the people of Bikini Atoll, in the Marshall Islands of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands.
